name: Fugue State
description:
Discover impossible landscapes, disturbing visuals, and strange geometries.

  • Explore over 70 unique worlds, each lovingly hand-crafted to tell that which must be told.
  • Hidden secrets and mysteries abound, waiting to be uncovered
  • Massive open worlds twist just behind your line of sight, bending as you walk
  • it was behind you a moment ago.
  • Now it's gone.
